\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{pFilePath}{pFilePath}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily const char$\ast$ VMA\+\_\+\+NOT\+\_\+\+NULL Vma\+Record\+Settings\+::p\+File\+Path}



Path to the file that should be written by the recording. 

Suggested extension\+: \char`\"{}csv\char`\"{}. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten. It will be opened for the whole time \mbox{\hyperlink{structVmaAllocator}{Vma\+Allocator}} object is alive. If opening this file fails, creation of the whole allocator object fails.
